name: CMU Yu Chen
body:
### Welcome to My Git Blog.
Hi, guys! I am Yu Chen. In this blog, I would like to share my computer skills and life with you when I am graduate.
By the way, I have a blog in [CSDN](http://blog.csdn.net/c602273091) during my undergraduate in Sun Yat-sen University, China.
Now I am persuing my master degree in **Electrical & Computing Engineering, Carnegie Mellon University.** My motto is **To see the world, things dangerous to come to, to see behind walls, to draw closer, to find each other and to feel. That is the purpose of LIFE.**

### My Project
To be continued.....

### My Life
To be continued...

### Support or Contact
If you want to know more me, you can visit my [Linkedin](https://cn.linkedin.com/in/yu-chen-aa6404b8). If you have any question, please contact me without hesitation.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
